Name: Space Yandere
About the game: Space Yandere is a cute, dramatic story experience, in which you play as a robot, made by the love-crazy Luna, en route to a paradise planet. The game features beautiful art, loveable characters, and compelling music. While containing elements of horror, the game is cute at its core. A single playthrough may take around 45 minutes. Full content ending: 'Perfect Blue'. Other endings are short game-overs.
